fields.label: Items
fields.description: List of items this pricing logic applies to

fields.label: Item Groups
fields.description: List of item groups this logic applies to

fields.label: Brands
fields.description: List of brands this logic applies to

fields.label: Transaction Type
fields.description: Whether the pricing logic applies to a sales or buying transaction

fields.label: Cumulative
fields.description: Indicates whether the logic is cumulative

fields.label: Coupon Code
fields.description: Optionally associate a coupon code with the pricing logic

fields.label: Customer Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple customers (for sales logic)

fields.label: Customer Group Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple customer groups (for sales logic)

fields.label: Territory Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple territories (for sales logic)

fields.label: Sales Partner Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple sales partners (for sales logic)

fields.label: Campaign Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple campaigns (for sales logic)

fields.label: Supplier Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple suppliers (for buying logic)

fields.label: Supplier Group Restriction
fields.description: Restrict the pricing logic to multiple supplier groups (for buying logic)

fields.label: Price List
fields.description: Price list this logic applies to

fields.label: Currency
fields.description: Currency associated with this pricing logic

fields.label: Value
fields.description: The pricing value, can be discount percentage or price per unit

fields.label: Pricing Method
fields.description: Pricing method if applicable

fields.label: Start Date
fields.description: The date when this pricing logic starts to apply

fields.label: End Date
fields.description: The date when this pricing logic ends (optional)

fields.label: Priority
fields.description: Priority of this pricing logic, lower number means higher priority

fields.label: Description
fields.description: A detailed description of the pricing logic

fields.label: Active
fields.description: Indicates whether the pricing logic is active
